hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j24" mk_add_options AUTOCLOBBER=1 EOF
cat > skip.list <<EOF -/usr/* -*/xpcom/tests/* -*/mfbt/tests/* -*/dom/bindings/Test* EOF source ~/checker_env/bin/activate export PATH=~/codechecker_package/CodeChecker/bin:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/:$PATH cat ~/codechecker_package/CodeChecker/config/package_layout.json CHECKS=$(CodeChecker checkers|awk '{print "-e " $2}' |grep -v -E "(alpha\.|osx\.|debug\.|google-readability-casting|llvm-include-order|google-readability-braces-around-statements)"|tr "\n" " ") CodeChecker check --postgresql --dbusername codechecker_user -j 13 -u suppress.txt --keep-tmp -s skip.list $CHECKS -n firefox_$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") -b "hg pull -u && hg update -r default && ./mach build -j 12"
